verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzar-adan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had let him <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, when he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> him being <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> all that were carried away <S%H1546>captive<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which were carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H935>brought<s%> it, and <S%H6213>done<s%> according as he hath <S%H1696>said<s%>: because ye have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, therefore this <S%H1697>thing<s%> is come upon you.

And now, behold, I <S%H6605>loose<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H246>chains<s%> which were upon thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. If it seem <S%H2896%H5869>good<s%> unto thee to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H935>come<s%>; and I will look <S%H7760%H5869>well<s%> unto thee: but if it seem <S%H7489%H5869>ill<s%> unto thee to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H2308>forbear<s%>: <S%H7200>behold<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: whither it <S%H413>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477%H5869>convenient<s%> for thee to <S%H3212>go<s%>, thither <S%H3212>go<s%>.

Now while he was not yet gone <S%H7725>back<s%>, he said, Go <S%H7725>back<s%> also to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>: or <S%H3212>go<s%> wheresoever it seemeth <S%H3477%H5869>convenient<s%> unto thee to <S%H3212>go<s%>. So the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H737>victuals<s%> and a <S%H4864>reward<s%>, and let him <S%H7971>go<s%>.

Then <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>; and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

¶ Now when all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> which were in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, even they and their <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H6485>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and had <S%H6485>committed<s%> unto him <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H802>women<s%>, and <S%H2945>children<s%>, and of the <S%H1803>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, of them that were not carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

Then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, even <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8576>Tanhumeth<s%>, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5778>Ephai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>, and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H4602>Maachathite<s%>, they and their <S%H582>men<s%>.

And <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto them and to their <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: dwell <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you.

As for me, behold, I will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to <S%H5975%H6440>serve<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, which will <S%H935>come<s%> unto us: but ye, <S%H622>gather<s%> ye <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in your <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> that ye have <S%H8610>taken<s%>.

Likewise when all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and among the <S%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, and in <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and that were in all the <S%H776>countries<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H5414>left<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and that he had <S%H6485>set<s%> over them <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>;

Even all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> returned <S%H7725>out<s%> of all <S%H4725>places<s%> whither they were <S%H5080>driven<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, unto <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%>.

¶ Moreover <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Dost thou <S%H3045>certainly<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H1185>Baalis<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> to <S%H5221%H5315>slay<s%> thee? But <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> them not.

Then <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let me <S%H3212>go<s%>, I pray thee, and I will <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> it: wherefore should he <S%H5221%H5315>slay<s%> thee, that all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> which are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> unto thee should be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>?

But <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>: for thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>.
